title: H&FJ New's Release Vitesse
content:
H&FJ has released a slab family called Vitesse. It looks awesome as expected.  
 [http://bit.ly/6y6tYZ](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123132943/http:/bit.ly/6y6tYZ "http://bit.ly/6y6tYZ")

Why does this look familiar to me? Has it been used in Wired or something?
author: kosal

comments.content:
Ridin' the slab wave!  
It's quite nice actually.

hhp
Nice. There's a Danish feel to it, somehow.
Looks to me like the love-child of Eurostile and City.

I think they're chasing Cyrus Highsmith, [Dispatch](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123132943/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/Dispatch) and Christian Schwartz, [Popular](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123132943/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/Popular) on this one. Doing a pretty good job of it too!
just when i was about to release _my_ family of squarish slabs...
